728442f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Road
728442f-b.text:
Arthur Kill Road, north side, at the head of Richmond
Road, showing the G. Housman Eouse, dating back to pre - Revolutionary
days. It is also known as the "House of Buried Treasure.' in which
gold was found in 1857 and 1921.
May 1, 1926
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, as seen from Richmond Road.
May 1, 1926
L. Sperr  R8 wEeouwrIoNs
(3)
An additonalview of the hodse, viewed along Richmond
Road from Court Street.
r  July 15, 1927
P. L. Sperr  No REPRODUCTIONS ~

728443f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Road
728443f-a.text:
(1)
Arthur Kill Road, north side, at the head of Richmond
Road, showing the G. Homan Hose, dating back to pre-Revolutionary
times. It is also known as the "House of Buried Treasure' in
which gold was found in 1857 and 1921. The view is from
Richmond Road.
April 6, 1938
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, at a later date.
February 1, 1939
P. L. Sperr
728443f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Richmond Road, Staten Island, NY

728446f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Road
728446f-a.text:
Arthur Kill Road (automobiles thereon) west from Richmond
Road (rig.ut) to Center Street. The 2 -D -story frame house,
at the head of Richmond Road and adjoining the Fairway Club,
is the G. Homian House, also known as the "House of Buried
Treasure," dating back to pre-Revolutionary days. The vkew
is northward from the Staten Island Historical Society Museum
at Center Street and Court Place. In the background is Latourette
Park.
April 6, 1938
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, another view.
April 6, 1938
L. Spc r
728446f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Richmond Road, Staten Island, NY

728444f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Road
728444f-a.text:
Arthur Kill Roa d, at the S.E. corner of Richmond
Road, showing the former parish house of t. Andrews P. E.
Church. I 1874 (Beerss map) the house belonged to Oliver
Hodge.
June 13, 1927
P. L. Sperr
728444f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Richmond Road, Staten Island, NY

728445f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Road
728445f-b.text:
(1)
Arthur Kill Road, north side, west from Richmond
Road to Senter Street. The first house is the G. Homan house.
It is also known as the "House of Buried Treasure'in whihh
Eald was found in 1857 and 1921.
December 9, 1924
By Wa. T. Davis
Vhrough P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, another view.
May 1, 1926
P. L. Sperr
(3)
An exclusive view of the G. Homan house.
August 23, 1916
By Wh. T. Davis
Through P. L. Sperr
